title: Ponta Delgada (Point and Ports of)
body: In this parish, there is a protrusion of the coastline called Ponta Delgada. In its closest vicinity, there is a small port and a limited beach, which serve this parish and those of Boaventura and Arco de São Jorge. In 1908, a short ramp was built there, providing access to a small beach to facilitate the transport of goods. There is also a small, not very extensive beach at a place called Passo da Areia.

Passo da Areia: Location with a not very extensive beach

1908: Construction of the short ramp to facilitate the transport of goods
